summary: With two more weeks until Christmas, a busy business man, Marc Rehnquist, hires a struggling artist, Anna Parisi, to help him pick out gifts for his friends and family.
cast: Katrina Law|Aaron O'Connell|Donna Mills|Melanie Nelson|Alesandra Durham|Jill Adler|Michael Burchard|Laiya White|Alyssa Buckner|JJ Neward|Matthew Sincell|Koleman Stinger|Enoch Ellis|Alex Nibley|Joy Haynes|Alexa Re|Brandon Ray Olive|Raquel Horton|Bryce Fernelius|Shareece Pfeiffer|James Anthony Green|Margo Watson|Susan Dolan Stevens|Tito Livas|John Forker|Devin K. Hansen|Debbie Starr Jackson|Michael McQuain|Marilyn Miller|Sheila Orey Sorensen|Cathy Tidwell|Jaci Twiss
title: Doce regalos de Navidad
